Timeline

Timeline is a display of a list of events (or milestones) in chronological order. in our case it could be a line with dots labelled with dates and events paralleling it.

Example:

Experience

  • Project Manager
    2016 - Current
    State of California

    Finally! Johne Doe got his dream job! He can work in the State now for the rest of his life.

  • Full Stack Developer
    2014 - 2016

    Google

    Winter purslane courgette pumpkin quandong komatsuna fennel green bean cucumber. Pea cress potato sprouts wattle seed rutabaga.

  • Frontend Developer

    2012 - 2014

    Amazon Inc.

    Winter purslane courgette pumpkin quandong komatsuna fennel green bean cucumber. Pea cress potato sprouts wattle seed rutabaga.

  • UX/UI Designer
    2010 - 2012
    Apple Inc.

    Winter purslane courgette pumpkin quandong komatsuna fennel green bean cucumber. Pea cress potato sprouts wattle seed rutabaga.

HTML Markup

Source code:
